title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-4.4 - When established
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-4.4 - When established

State Regulations

The replacement reserve shall be set aside out of
project revenue as of the last day of each calendar quarter beginning with the
quarter in which the date of substantial completion falls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
